section.name: Downloading Jen
section.p:
You can download both source and binary snapshots from the release distribution directory at
our Java.net homepage. Developers (and anyone else with access to CVS binary) can also check out the source for any particular release, or the latest development version, directly from the Roscopeco Open Technologies CVS repository.

Please choose from the following:
Downloading a snapshot or release archive
Obtaining source via CVS
